description:
In WORMHOLE, you're a giant space worm eating, shooting, dashing, and exploding your way through the cosmos. Warp through wormholes to navigate obstacles, refill your energy, and quickly find your next meal. This adrenaline-fuelled arcade action game features galaxies to consume, a stackable perk system, worms with cowboy hats, and a spooky chiptune soundtrack ripped straight from Draculaâ€™s tape deck.

WORMHOLE features
-100+ handcrafted levels available in two game modes (arcade and marathon)
-Three unique abilities, each with its own play style, and a variety of stackable perks
-Over 60 unlockable colour palettes
-A high energy, retro-inspired chiptune soundtrack
name: WORMHOLE
intro: Eat, shoot, dash, and explode your way through the cosmos in this adrenaline-fuelled arcade action game.
